articles.description: The duo, aged 38 and 28 respectively, glammed up to the nines to deliver the address over video link, with the former resplendent in a volumunious Greta Constantine gown
articles.content:
They had the prestigious honour of announcing the nominees for the 93rd Academy Awards, which are due to take place next month.
And Priyanka Chopra and her husband Nick Jona certainly gave the event… [+4476 chars]

articles.author: Rory Tingle
articles.title: Oscars 2021: British star Riz Ahmed is first Muslim Best Actor nominee - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 38-year-old Londoner won rave reviews for his depiction of Ruben Stone, a rock-and-roll drummer and recovering alcoholic whose life goes into a free-fall when he loses his hearing.
articles.content:
British actor Riz Ahmed today made history to become the first Muslim nominated for an Oscar for lead actor for his role in hit film Sound of Metal.
